overview: Romy is a brave little girl. She has a budgie called Mimi and Mimi got lost. Romy’s determination to find her budgie brings her out into the ancient woods, where she meets all sorts of everyday characters, each with their own story. She’ll not only make new friends along the way, but mainly she enjoys her adventure.
tagline: “Ants, please tell Mimi I ain’t mad at her and I’m waiting for her here.”
title: She – Hero
